content: these are thick and very well insulating potholders in modern design ideal to remove hot pots and casseroles out of the oven and always a welcome gift the pattern gives detailed instruction for two generous king-sized potholders that measures approx 24 x 17 cm 9 5 x 6 75 inches a scheme to make the potholders smaller approx 20 x 15 cm 8 x 6 inches is included worsted weight pure cotton give best results in texture and insulating effect for 2 potholders you will need 90 g 3 2 ounces in the main color a and 25 g 0 9 ounces in the contrasting colour b many thanks to my committed testers alexaapo 1 jstockert 2 mstenor 3 ratsaspets 4 and timmc 5 who all gave me very solid feedback and helped a lot in featuring the pattern 1 https //www ravelry com/people/alexaapo 2 https //www ravelry com/people/jstockert 3 https //www ravelry com/people/mstenor 4 https //www ravelry com/people/ratsaspets 5 https //www ravelry com/people/timmc
